ac: 19, touch 10, flat-footed 17 (+4 armor, +2 Dex, +5 natural, -2 rage)
melee: mwk morningstar +12 (1d8+6), bite +9 (1d6+3) or 2 claws +11 (1d4+6), bite +9 (1d6+3)
other_gear: +1 studded leather, mwk javelin, mwk morningstar, antitoxin, 66 gp

sections.body:
During Combat The berserker uses the knockdown rage power on enemies who are heavily armored or wield heavy weapons.

Base Statistics When she's not raging, the berserker's statistics are

AC 21, touch 12, flat-footed 19

hp 54

Fort +9

Will +2

Melee mwk morningstar +10 (1d8+4), bite +7 (1d6+3) or claw +9 (1d4+3), bite +7 (1d6+2)

Str 18

Con 15

CMB +9

Skills Swim +19.
sections.name: Tactics

name: Lizardfolk Berserker
skills: Acrobatics +12 (+16 when jumping), Perception +10, Survival +7, Swim +21
combat_gear: potion of cure moderate wounds, potions of magic fang  (2), tanglefoot bags (2)
